sentence.Network_en: He tip-toed to the door in his stockinged feet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他踮着脚尖走到门口，只穿着袜子没穿鞋。

sentence.Network_en: She toed scrupulously into the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 她小心翼翼地踮着脚走进房间。

auth_sentence.content: Stranger things have happened just look at pointy shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Stranger things have happened just look at pointy shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Stranger things have happened just look at pointy shoes.

auth_sentence.content: Odd-toed ungulates include the horse, tapirs, and rhinoceroses.
auth_sentence.res_content: Odd-toed ungulates include the horse, tapirs, and rhinoceroses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Odd-toed ungulates include the horse, tapirs, and rhinoceroses.

auth_sentence.content: Sleek and pointy, they take the trousers into eveningwear.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sleek and pointy, they take the trousers into eveningwear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sleek and pointy, they take the trousers into eveningwear.
